alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Murray; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:24AM CDT until June 10 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Northeastern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Western Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Western Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 224 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Foster to near Ratliff City to 4 miles south of Healdton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wynnewood, Wilson, Springer, Elmore City, Katie, Foster, Tatums, Ratliff City, Graham, Pooleville, Turner Falls, Hennepin, Milo, Fox and Pernell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
